James and Brittney

RSVP

We are getting married!

Location: Gainesville, FL. When: October 12th 2019

We can't wait to spend our most memorable night with our best friends and family. You all mean so much to us and we hope everyone can make it!

What do I need to know?

Ceremony

Baughman Center 5:30PM - 6PM

The wedding ceremony will take place in a small chapel on the campus of the University of Florida. It will be officiated by the couple's friend, Alex Grim.

Reception

The Wooly 6PM-10:45PM

The reception will take place in the heart of downtown Gainesville, The Wooly, and will be catered by one of it's most beloved restaurants, The Top. Cocktail hour is from 6PM to 7PM.

Dress Code

Finally! The excuse you've been looking for to get dressed up and pretty. The dress code for this event is semi-formal, but come ready for a night of dancing.

Parking / Transportation

While the ceremony venue will have on-site parking starting at 5PM. Parking for the reception in downtown Gainesville will be more difficult. The bride and groom recommend taking an Uber or car pooling.

What's the hashtag?

Help us capture the moment, tag your photos with the hashtag #JamesAndBrittney

Where should I stay?

We've picked out a few hotels around town

10 minutes by car from the reception. $90/night

What should I get?

Don't forget your presence is the best gift you could give us

Our Amazon Registry contains all of the household essentials a newlywed couple needs! When you order from the list it'll be shipped right to the couple's house.
